txt.en: Return to the entrance of the cave
The beast falls to your mighty attacks, but the haversack mentioned by the mariner is nowhere to be found. There is a commotion near the entrance.
Hunting for the items lost by the mariner when he came to shore you happened upon massive footprints. They lead you here to a cave to face the beast within.
The tomb-robber is dead. Get back to the mariner.
